name: NeuLion
tag_list: iptv, sports, college-athletics, nhl, nfl, ufc
overview: NeuLion is a leading IPTV company providing a comprehensive suite of technology and services to content owners and aggregators. NeuLion provides an end-to-end technology solution which enables content to be monetized and streaming to multiple platforms through browser based devices. Content can be viewed on the computer, television through proprietary set top box, mobile and other IP enabled devices.

acquisitions.source_description: NeuLion Agrees to Acquire IPTV Technology Solutions Company TransVideo International Ltd.
